p: Diets in the fish trial were supplemented with 1 mg kg -1 of organic or inorganic Se. Dietary Se level of 2.06 mg kg -1 has been shown to be beneficial for Nile tilapia and this requirement cannot be met by an aquafeed that is not enriched with Se [ 51]. During the 7-week fish trial fish demonstrated expected performance. Survival was 100% for all the treatment groups with a mean weekly weight gain of 41 and 45 grams for inorganic and organic Se fed fish, respectively.
